###### (Note to self: Installing packages in a code chunk won't make the document render, so you'll need to run it separately in the console.)

```{r}
library(pacman)

p_load(dlookr,
       DMwR2, 
       GGally, 
       Hmisc, 
       palmerpenguins, 
       tidyverse)
       
data(algae, package = "DMwR2")

algae |> glimpse()

algae$a1 |>
  mean()

algae$a1 |>
  median()

Mode <- function(x, na.rm=FALSE){
if(na.rm) x<-x[!is.na(x)]
ux <- unique (x)
return (ux[which.max(tabulate(match(x, ux)))])
}

algae$a2 |> Mode()

algae$a1 |> centralValue()

algae$speed |> centralValue()

algae$a1 |> var()

algae$a1 |> sd()

algae$a1 |> range()

algae$a1 |> max()

algae$a1 |> min()

algae$a1 |> IQR()

algae$a1 |> quantile()

algae$a1 |> quantile(probs = c(0.2, 0.8))

library(purrr)

nas <- algae %>% 
  purrr::map_dbl(~sum(is.na(.))) %>% 
  sum()

cat("The dataset contains ", nas, "NA values. \n")

incomplete_rows <- algae %>% 
  summarise_all(~!complete.cases(.)) %>%
  nrow()

algae |> summary()

data("penguins")
penguins |> Hmisc::describe()


```
